jquery.description: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation, and Ajax much simpler with an easy-to-use API that works across a multitude of browsers.

react.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

bootstrap.description: Quickly design and customize responsive mobile-first sites with Bootstrap, the worldâ€™s most popular front-end open source toolkit, featuring Sass variables and mixins, responsive grid system, extensive prebuilt components, and powerful JavaScript plugins.

express.description: Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications.
